name: Weapon Triangle
description:
A Small test project made to test a game concept and practice Unity.
2 player game. Space between each other and have a winning weapon equipped when you collide

Sword beats Axe, Axe Beats Lance, and Lance beats Sword

Left player swaps weapons with A, S, and D, and can back pedal with Shift
Right player swaps weapons with J, K, and L, and can back pedal with Space

Sounds used

Music - https://pixabay.com/music/main-title-battle-of-the-dragons-8037/

Ready Sound - https://freesound.org/people/steel2008/sounds/231277/

Man Dying - https://freesound.org/people/Under7dude/sounds/163442/

Sword Hit - https://freesound.org/people/ethanchase7744/sounds/439508/
